CREATE STREAM output AS SELECT id, val AS ROWPARTITION, other_val AS ROWOFFSET FROM input;

tests.name: create ROWOFFSET and ROWPARTITION sink user columns as STRINGs- ROWOFFSET/ROWPARTITION enabled

CREATE STREAM output AS SELECT id, val AS ROWPARTITION, other_val AS ROWOFFSET FROM input;

expectedException.message: `ROWPARTITION` is a reserved column name. You cannot use it as an alias for a column.
